You look happy. Very, always, always active and sociable.

That's why I'm about to vomit and it's painful

I was told that it would turn into water where life would be active when it rained like rain.

I want to make something for Menoko-chan ... I want to give it as a gift ...
I don't like it, I don't hate it
I wonder if it's irresistible and frustrating that the noisy sound echoes so far.
The walls are thin, so here ...
I think it's painful, but I'm looking forward to seeing you.
Sometimes I'm happy because of you.
Thank you for being with me.
Because ... it's a hassle, right? My body is full of scratches and dirty ...
It was often said that I didn't want to breathe the same air as I did.
He is the most important to me. He takes good care of me, but he can't stand it and hits me.
... I want to meet ... But maybe I'm not here.
I just want to spend time with you ...
It's painful, I can spend a lot of time alone ...

・ ・ ・ ・ ・ ・ Don't deceive people anymore ...
I'm you. You will be me.
I'll be with you all the time.
The flimsy life is over. From now on, I will be there. Hohoho.
You don't have to wake up anymore.
There is no pain, no pain, no stress. In a space like the one I wrote in this picture, I'll be with me all the time.
Well, is he still not awake?
No way ... Mr. Persi's consciousness never returns ...
Even though Arity Nora's consciousness has returned ...
‥‥‥ With this, the use of "Deep cons" will be temporarily stopped worldwide.
I have to ask her in detail about the situation.
Today, I found information about Arity's senior at the company who committed suicide.
It was a story that she was bragging about you.
Certainly she had such a clause.
‥‥‥House? I didn't have that kind of feeling in particular.
(Even if you try to ask forcibly, you will only be lied to ... This story is meaningless.)
Well, so I'll leave this story here for now.
I found something that I was a little worried about.
Judging from that information, wasn't Arity suitable for the stalking damage?
I don't know. I was loved by many people.
Do you remember the man who sent you many letters?
Oh, I remember him very well.
I never thought he was a stalker.
You said he chose to save me in this hell.
I don't think I've said that.
(I don't remember what I said in the spiritual world ...?)
(No, that's right ... I seemed to have a too clear consciousness.
Did his parents have something like shackles?
No, I was a strict parent, but I don't think that was the case ...
What did Arity think of her life with her parents-in-law?
Yes, as I said many times, they were basically kind people.
You used to leak or show disgust about your step-parents if you weren't dissatisfied.
The cause has been clarified by investigating this time.
Didn't you have been severely disciplined?
I think I couldn't stand my birth and lack of elegance.
‥‥‥ Because they were people who care about the eyes.
‥‥‥I agree. I could guess that they had a very nervous personality, which I remembered as Arity.
Didn't Arity kill them for that reason?
‥‥‥No. No matter how harsh the environment is, we won't do that.
I also admit that when they committed suicide, they certainly had a feeling of joy.
However‥‥‥. I never wanted to give them salvation.
Is it a statement that affirms salvation as murder?
I'm sorry, I told you a strange story
Is it a statement that affirms salvation as murder?
Is it a statement that affirms salvation as murder?
As I said before, everyone I get along with will die or go missing.
My mother said. Living is a series of painful things.
Isn't the teacher thinking the same thing?
If so, I think my word of salvation should also be affirmed.
I'm sorry, I told you a strange story

‥‥‥how is your day? Do you have anything to remember?

I remember talking about something, but the content is ...

In a dress, her face was covered with an octopus-like pattern.
‥‥‥ Is there anything you have in mind?
‥‥‥ Sometimes in my dream, a woman looks like the teacher says.
Meeting her benevolent girlfriend makes my heart very peaceful.
But that is only a vague memory.
I was always wondering what I was talking about and why I was relieved.
She is inside me, isn't she?
In your heart, a clearly floating spirit is being born.
If she goes on like this, she could harm you.
So she should stop having her positive feelings towards her.
I think she is protecting you.
Maybe she's taking over some of the load on Arity's heart.
That's why I think she keeps track of Arity's feelings and her actions.
From my point of view, her presence is a great pleasure.
No matter how much Arity keeps her silent, she will give me information.
By continuing her dialogue with her, she can see how you are committing the murder.
Today, I found something in your spiritual world that interests you.
I hear he stripped his face and died himself.
I think that what he gave me was a white ring.
When I asked you before, you said you didn't know him in detail.
However, if you are a friend who gets a ring, isn't it something you don't know?
I don't want to remember him too much.
I think he and I were on good terms.
The reason was that he talked to me.
He is a kind person who worshiped me and thought only about me.
When I was with him, I thought I wasn't alone.
Among them, he also began to pretend to want to be intimate with me.
And ... I got the white ring.
I was very happy in my heart.
I was scared when I imagined him dying.
But the result was the same. The next day, he stripped his face and chose to commit suicide.
If I don't decline the confession, or ...
It doesn't explain why I lied

It is to keep him in my heart as a memory of him as an eternal thing.
I have too many good memories ...
Every time I remember him, it gets harder.

You are unconsciously trying to forget what happened at that time.
That event has messed up your mind.

I felt it from time to time.
Things that are writhing in me.

Don't you really remember killing someone?
It's an expression I don't remember.
The face of a colleague who suffers from algae scratching, sheds tears, and dies with an ecstatic expression.
A man who strips his face and presents it to me like a tribute.
There are various images in my head that I have never seen.
‥‥‥ I have never really killed a person.
But ... I'm sure this memory is ...
Everyone who interacts with me will die.
Both my oppressed mother and I have been passive happiness when it comes to salvation of death.
It's a relief from hard days ...
That's why my father and mother were saved by me.
I'm sure my mother-in-law and father-in-law will be saved ...
I can't stand that it's a meaningless, vague death ...
There is one thing you can do.
Acknowledge and atone for sins that you do not remember.
‥‥‥ It is the only way you will be rewarded.

If you are forgiven by suffering a sin that doesn't exist.
